page.title: 14 PRIORY FARM
page.content: {Priory Farm}stretches over{120 {acres}and is owned by{Mr.Shinner.}It was one of the first{Pick _ Your _ Own farms in Britain.It offers a wide range of soft fruit including {strawberries,raspberries,plums,black_ {currants,redcurrants,gooseberries}and many others. As well as selling soft fruit he has{2000 pigs,}sold to farmers as far} a field as{Borneo,France,Australia}and {Trinidad. } He has a{lake}for{three}reasons, for{watering crops,fishing}and a {scenic attraction. They need lots of workers,{full {time}and{part time}including{4}land workers,{5}pig workers and{6}women who do lots of little jobs.They also have a tremendous number of people picking {fruit }at different times.
